definition: to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to describe sth as/an analogy/a simile/a metaphor/an allegory

sentences.english: Metaphor and metonymy are treated as two different figures of speech in traditional rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的修辭理論把隱喻和換喻作爲兩個並列的修辭格。

sentences.english: The most specific or direct meaning of a word.
sentences.chinese: 比喻意義代替另一種的換喻。
